content: You are absolutely right. the impact of the trade tariffs is not just limited to farmers, but it also affects the entire agricultural industry, including logistics providers, processors, and distributors. additionally, the trade tariffs have ripple effects that extend beyond just the agricultural industry. the uncertainty caused by trade tensions can affect business investments, consumer behavior, and global economic stability, which can impact various industries and even entire countries. therefore, resolving trade disputes between countries is crucial for the stability of the global economy.
